GCA.1: mild atrophy: opening of sulci; Koedam = 1 Mild parietal cortical atrophy
GCA.2: Moderate atrophy: volume loss of gyri; Koedam = 2
GCA.3: severe end-stage atrophy: "knife blade", Substantial widening of sulci

Koedam.0: No posterior atrophy, no posterior cingulate and parieto-occipital sulci
Koedam.1: mild widening of posterior cingulate and occipital sulci
Koedam.3: extreme widening of posterior cingulate and occipital sulci
Koedam.2: substantial sulcal widening of posterior cingulate and parieto-occipital sulci, substantial gyral atrophy

MTA.0: no atrophy, no widening of the temporal horn of lateral ventricle
MTA.2: also widening of temporal horn of lateral ventricle
MTA.1: widening of the temporal horn of lateral ventricle
MTA.3: moderate loss of hippocampal volume (decrease in height)
